txt.en:
Garan snorts when Waltney says he would have checked the road himself.

'Come now, wife, you know how my old battle injury ails me,' he says, scowling at her.

'Battle? Hah! You got that brawling with Sam at the tavern, you old coot,' she says, cackling.
Ghostly Roads
Ost Waeren is near the road south of Eitheldir.\n\nWaltney Maythorn has asked you to investigate the ruins of Ost Waeren.

Garan snorts when Waltney says he would have checked the road himself.

'Come now, wife, you know how my old battle injury ails me,' he says, scowling at her.

'Battle? Hah! You got that brawling with Sam at the tavern, you old coot,' she says, cackling.
Talk to the elderly couple
'You return! You have my thanks for your assistance, friend! We can press on to Tornhad now!'

'I have another task for you, if you are willing. A couple, most advanced in age as far as Men go, passed through my camp recently. The Maythorns are on their way down to meet their son, a Ranger living in Tornhad. The couple refused to turn back, and I was unable to offer them an escort. If you happen to be travelling that way, please look for them and give what help you may. The roads south are dangerous, and the elders are not the sort who can protect themselves against the threats of the Angle.'
DNT - Look for the ghostly figure
Waltney and Garan Maythorn are located near Ost Waeren.\n\nYou should let Waltney and Garan know that the ravagers have been defeated.
Defeated Ost Waeren ravagers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Examine the pack
You have spotted a caravan!
DNT - Examine the disturbed ground
An elderly couple uncovers ancient secrets and threats on the road to join their son.
The road to Tornhad is in the western Angle.\n\nYou should look for the elderly couple along the road to Tornhad.

'Greetings fellow traveller! Oh, Elladan sent you, did he? Hmph. I knew he would not be able to let us alone. We do not need help! Well, that is, we did not need help until a few moments ago.'

He sighs, wringing his hands.

'I am Waltney Maythorn the Second and this is the wife, Garan Maythorn. We are travelling south to meet our son, Waltney the Third, and his family in Tornhad. Trouble is, you see, there is something not of this world on the road ahead, or my horse is pink. Perhaps, if you happen to be going that way anyhow, you could see whether the road is clear? I would do it myself, of course, but my knee is not what it used to be.'
Waltney and Garan Maythorn are located near Eitheldir.\n\nElladan has asked you to see how fares the elderly couple headed to Tornhad.
Find the elderly couple
DNT - The brigand dropped a pack!
DNT - A tin of chalky-white paint! Good for pretending to be a ghost.

'Elladan told us this place was called Ost Waeren. The stones of these ruins hold memories. Echoes of those who walked beneath now fallen arches, who slept within the crumbled walls, and who perished in the many battles this land has seen. I will be more than happy to be pressing on.'
DNT - The ghostly figure can be found near the road south of Eitheldir. \n\nYou should look for the ghostly figure.
Return to the elderly couple
DNT - The dirt pile is near the road south of Eitheldir.\n\nYou should defeat investigate the pile of dirt.
Defeat Ost Waeren ravagers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Elladan told us this place was called Ost Waeren. The stones of these ruins hold memories. Echoes of those who walked beneath now fallen arches, who slept within the crumbled walls, and who perished in the many battles this land has seen. I will be more than happy to be pressing on.'
DNT - The ground has been disturbed here
